entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character who is disoriented by the sudden appearance of people and his scar is burning fiercely.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is one of Harry's friends who makes a joke about making things up as they go along.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is another friend of Harry's who is called back for the fight and is trying to stop it.

entities.name: dean
entities.description: Dean is a person who receives a message that Harry is back and they are going to fight.

relationships.description: Harry tells Neville to stop the fight.
Dean receives a message that Harry is back and they are going to fight.
